definitions.definition: Of a system , currently not connected (generally electrically) to a larger network. For example, a power plant which is not connected to the grid , or a computer which is not connected to the Internet or to any other communications service.
examples: I saved the web pages so I could read them later offline .

definitions.definition: Happening in the physical world (the real world ) as opposed to on the internet.

main_definition: Of a system , currently not connected (generally electrically) to a larger network. For example, a power plant which is not connected to the grid , or a computer which is not connected to the Internet or to any other communications service.
secondary_definitions: ( by extension ) Happening in the physical world (the real world ) as opposed to on the internet.
